page.title: 19LOCAL ISSUES IN THE VILLAGES
page.content: The old village families regret the { influx of town people}who do not understand the ethos of village life nor the country code!The loss of vill- age self-sufficiency and the coming of "commuterland" is also mourned. Another large concern is the{high { cost of housing}which prevents the young staying or moving in:the sale of Council houses is criticised.The lack of a full social and age range is lead -ing to{dying communities}with bus services and local shops put at risk. There is concern at the removal and spraying of{hedgerows}and their harm- ful effect on flora and fauna and the loss of ploughed-up{footpaths. There is the problem of{dogs}barking and fouling in public places where there is also increased litter.{Cars going too fast and late at night are condemned.One or two see{no problems.
